question: 👽 💘 ☕ 👏
answer:
👽-did you discover dan or phil first?

i know that they both existed bc of my friend but dan was the first one i watched a video from

💘-favorite phan moment?

the entire gaming channel the thinking out loud thing was the first thing that came to mind but i could create a 20 page long list of all my favorite phan moments

☕️-phan theories that annoy you?

the theory that dnp are pretending to be friends or whatever that bs is and the theory that dnp used to date but don’t anymore like its obvious that their love for each other has only grown like lendksjdk

👏-express your love for dan/phil in a word.

DADS

blog.name: phandomreversebang
blog.title: Phandom Reverse Bang 2019
blog.description:
Welcome to the 4th edition of the Phandom Reverse Bang! We're a big bang in reverse; artists create themed pieces of art, and authors claim said work to write a fic based around them! 
  Mobile Navigation

summary: Want to be an artist for the PRB but can’t think of an Idea? - We got you covered!
body:
Want to be an artist for the PRB but can’t think of an Idea? - We got you covered!

Here is a list of Prompts that you can use for your art: 

  • Dan and Phil are stranded at an airport because of a blizzard 
  • Dan and Phil spending a winter holiday together for the first time ever 
  • Dan and Phil make a snowman 
  • Dan and / or Phil sees snow for the first time 
  • Cozy winter evenings spent next to the fireplace = cuddling Dan and Phil 
  • Dan and Phil going to Starbucks during a snowstorm and enjoying hot beverages together 
  • Dan and Phil go Christmas shopping for their children (think of how cute this could be!) 
  • Dan and Phil get stranded in a car on the way to an event because of a blizzard 
  • Hogwarts!au Dan and Phil during the winter 
  • Dan and Phil making snow angels and spending a day outside playing in the snow 
  • Dan and Phil decide to go to Australia and they realize it’s their winter season when they’re going to be there
  • Dan and Phil have a snow day with their kids and spend the day building snow forts, getting in snowball fights, and drinking hot cocoa in front of the fire place 

Find a prompt that you like? Great! 

Sign up for the PRB here to be an artist! 

If you see one of these prompts, and you really want to do it but want some tips and tricks on how to get it done, contact us here on the blog and a few of the admins can help you out step by step!

blog.name: yourlocalphillie
blog.title: you’re so unique and amazing
blog.description: chloe | 16 | check my art under “my art” tag | mostly a phanartist

tags: i had a burst of creativity
body:
october nineteenth


It was a soft October night. Twinkling silver stars where caught out of the corner of my eye, not going unnoticed yet not something he was completely aware of at the time. Phils milky white skin wrapped around Dan’s, just a few layers of fabric between them. Dan closed his eyes and breathed in the other boys sent- knowing he will hold everything about today close to his heart. The heaviness in his heart dwelled over his head; the thought that He would be leaving in the days to come. He gently shook his head casting the intrusive ideas away. Phils breaths, so loud, so sweet where what he focused on instead. He laid their counting them for what felt like an eternity. Love radiates from within him as his eyes follow the curve of phils nose and dart to each freckle on his face. Soon enough a deep slumber fell over him, their breaths synchronised, the boys lay still pulled close physically, and emotionally.

Dreams filled with 3 am laughter and the loss of distance. Falling in live again, without the screen to hide secrets; hearts now exploding with every embrace finally anchoring on the cuff of something beautiful.

Eyes lock over the busy rooms, fingers brushing under tables, intoxication with each other hidden in the best way .

summary: why do you have a blog dedicated to reblogging posts you hate? all you need to do is scroll past them, problem solved. ughh.
question: why do you have a blog dedicated to reblogging posts you hate? all you need to do is scroll past them, problem solved. ughh.
answer:
Hate is an overstatement. I’m embarrassed by those posts and by the fact that I’m in the same fandom with their authors.

You need to realize that when people who call themselves members of the phandom post weird shit about D&P, they contribute to the negative stereotypes about the phandom. They’re the reason why everybody thinks we’re all lunatics. I don’t want to reinforce that, thank you very much. That’s why I try to make people more self-aware with this blog.
